name: mega-bracelet
effect: Allows the player's Pokémon to Mega Evolve.
short_effect: Allows the player's Pokémon to Mega Evolve.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This cuff contains an untold power that somehow
enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to
Mega Evolve in battle.
